title: Lindsay Rhodes & teams that won't make the playoffs
itunes:title: Lindsay Rhodes & teams that won't make the playoffs
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by Handsome Hank who returns from vacation and the first ever visit by host of Total Access, Lindsay Rhodes! The group starts up talking about the NFL's best storylines and if dynasties are good for the NFL (5:38)? Next, Dave added the Buffalo Bills to the list of teams that won't make the playoffs in 2018 and let Hank and Lindsay debate his list (12:45). Then, the group kibitzed about if Tom Brady throwing to Eric Decker is the best looking duo in NFL history (19:20). Lastly, Shek, Hank and Lindsay break down their favorite and most overrated animated Disney movies (27:10).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
